Events that occurred on 29 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 134.
1958 - Actor Lenny Henry is born.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 354, the last letter to be included in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien.
1977 - Mythcon 8 at University of San Diego, California.
1980 - Author Douglas C. Kenney dies.
1985 - Voice actor Patrick Barr dies.
2013 - Guardians of Middle-earth is released on Windows.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
